name: Olympix 2020 (nmiel)
description:
In the Ram Don’s “Olympix” game you’ll be playing from the perspective of an Olympic Games board member as they deal with the controversies and issues when planning out the Tokyo 2020 games. The decisions that the board will face will include important issues in areas such as social decisions, environmental impact, budgetary concerns, athlete activity and more.

Compatible on mobile devices.

Created by Colby Tortorici, Marcos Noah Guzman, and Max Madden
